    <div style="width: 500px; padding-top: 10px">
        <p>RightClickHarvest is a simple mod for Minecraft that allows you to harvest crops by right-clicking them.</p>
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center;">
            <img src="demo.gif" />
        </div>
        <p>RightClickHarvest supports many crops:</p>
        <ul style="list-style: none;">
            <li>Crops</li>
            <li>Modded crops</li>
            <li>Sugar cane</li>
            <li>Cocoa beans</li>
            <li>Nether wart</li>
        </ul>
        <p><a href="https://discord.jamalam.tech/">Support</a></p>
        <p><a href="https://github.com/JamCoreModding/RightClickHarvest">Issue & feature request tracker</a></p>
    </div>
</div>
